main_definition: A gym, also known as a fitness center or exercise facility, is a place where people go to engage in physical activities, workouts, and exercises under professional guidance.

meanings_and_examples.example: John goes to the gym every day after work to lift weights and stay fit.
Sara enrolled in a yoga class at her local gym for stress relief and flexibility training.
The gym offers various workout areas, including cardio zones, weight rooms, and group exercise classes.
As a member of the Gold's Gym fitness club, Mark has access to personal trainers and swimming pools in addition to workout equipment.
